version-required.description: The Deno version required for this project from the '.denorc' file.

version-check.description: Check the installed Deno version is the same as the required version.

cli.description: Show your bank account balances in the terminal.
cli.command: deno task ver && deno run --allow-net --allow-read --allow-env src/cli.ts

server.description: Start a web server to display your bank account balances in a web browser.
server.command: deno task ver && deno run --allow-net --allow-write=./ --allow-read --allow-env src/server.ts

lint.description: Run Deno's linting and formatting tools with the configuration defined above
